text: Bɨ olap takaw kɨles ak agɨl agup, Yad kumen, tap yɨp okok apin tek bɨlokɨnɨmɨb agup. Takaw anɨb ak, takaw ag adek nokom lup tek mɨdeb. Pen ne anɨb agek, takaw ag adek nokom lup anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, yokɨp yɨbɨl mɨdel mɨdel, pɨsnep kumek nep, agup tek bɨlok lɨpal. Ne kɨm yeknɨŋ, tap nop ma bɨlok lɨpal.
